name: Ni no Kuni II: Revenant Kingdom - King's Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following
Ni no Kuni II: Revenant Kingdom Game Software
Exclusive making-of Blu-ray disc
Joe Hisaishi-composed theme vinyl record
Evolution of a King diorama figure
20 cm tall rotating scenes music box that plays the game’s main theme
Exclusive 148-pages artbook featuring concept art from Yoshiyuki Momose and Level-5
An exclusive SteelBook case
Season Pass
